isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - Cleaning - Cylinder Head

step1.para: Remove the lifting bracket from the cylinder head.

With the valves installed to protect the seats, use a rotary wire brush or gasket scraper with mineral spirits to remove any deposits and gasket material from the gasket surface of the cylinder head. Be careful not to damage the cylinder head gasket surface.

Use a suitable solvent and brush to remove any dirt, grease and other deposits from all of the bolt holes, oil return holes, water passages and fuel galleries. Rinse thoroughly with hot water and dry the cylinder heads with filtered compressed air.
